about_the_game:
Dive into a mysterious world on a quest for a lost civilization. Solve puzzles and try to prevent disaster from unfolding.

Nyria, a young archaeologist and adventurer, is searching for a way to save her world from a dire fate.

To do so, she places her hopes in exploring the ruins of an ancient and mysterious civilization that vanished long ago.

In the Depths of the Ruins, she encounters mysterious entities and follows in the footsteps of explorers who came before her.

She gradually uncovers numerous Secrets of the Forgotten Past and comes to understand that these ruins are, in fact, connected to the very fabric of Space and Time.

As the only one capable of unraveling and solving the threads of destiny, Nyria unexpectedly finds herself carrying a burden far heavier than she ever imagined…

Navigate the traps protecting the ruins and help the inhabitants.

Energy

Manipulate the energy of Generators to activate or deactivate other objects.

Switches & Blocks

Move energy-charged blocks to activate mechanisms within the ruins and carve your path forward.

Features:

  • Challenge yourself by solving puzzles in an exciting adventure lasting 7 to 9 hours.

  • Meet the strange inhabitants of the ruins.

  • Whether you’re new to puzzles or an experienced player, Monolith's Dreamers offers levels tailored to every type of player.

  • The controls are simplified to ensure easy handling and provide a puzzle-focused experience.

About Us :

We are an independent video game studio made up of a team of passionate developers.

We love retro games and pixel art, and we aim to share our passion with players through unique and captivating experiences.

Our ambition is to create quality content for players, blending traditional and innovative experiences in small to mid-budget games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11, DX12 compatible
  • VR Support: Non
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit processor and operating system required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11, DX12 compatible
  • VR Support: Non
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit processor and operating system required

short_description: A captivating 2D puzzle game where strategic thinking is essential. Explore the world of the Monoliths, outwit the traps guarding the ruins, and help the inhabitants. Solve puzzles that block your progress by collecting and redistributing energy.
